content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Steam Power Generation (x=-9.5 y=-0.5 to x=1.5 y=7.5)
Generates electricity using steam power.
Consists of the following entities:
- Offshore Pump at Position(x=-9.5, y=-0.5)
- Boiler at Position(x=-4.5, y=3.0) (Fueled with coal)
- Steam Engine at Position(x=1.5, y=7.5)
- PipeGroup
